========
Location
========

The purpose of the :mod:`location` component is to store the location of objects
(cells, the tip of an electrode, the focal point of a microscope) within the brain.

This component depends on :mod:`helmholtz.neuralstructures` and :mod:`helmholtz.equipment`.
